metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48468 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
protobuf-c before 1.4.1 has an unsigned integer overflow in parse_required_member.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48468` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libprotobuf-c1 - 1.4.1-1ubuntu2
protobuf-c-compiler - 1.4.1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: protobuf-c package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.1-1ubuntu2').
